dialogue: We have the results of the employee communications survey.
The number one problem is "fear of giving negative news to managers."
What?! Why haven't I heard this before?
Well... maybe because it's negative news?
Do you have a solution or did you just come to insult me?
Ooh. Um... maybe if we wait a few days it will take care of itself.
Happily, there are no other communication problems whatsoever.
I wonder why so many problems go away on their own.
I have no comment at this time.
